content.question: Which of the following best characterizes relations between the English and American Indians in New England following Metacomâ€™s War?

choices.label: Religious freedom for the English and American Indians
Dramatic decline and dispersion of the American Indian population
Recognition of American Indian property and land rights

content.answer: Dramatic decline and dispersion of the American Indian population

topic.text: 2.5: Interactions Between American Indians and Europeans
